Posts.Content: Hi All I had my last fill up a couple of weeks ago and just before Christmas I thought it seemed slightly smaller, anyway yesterday I’ve gone from a tight C cup to a floppy A cup. Has this happened to anybody else and does it mean more surgery? Thanks.
Posts.Title: Expander implant leaked

Posts.Content: Yes I’d just got to the desired size on my last fill up the week before Christmas. Because I’m in the middle of chemo the surgeon was going to replace it with a normal implant around March, after chemo and before radiotherapy.  The hospital managed to get hold of the surgeon and I have to see her 2nd January. I think it’ll have to be replaced sooner now.
Posts.Title: Expander implant leaked

Posts.Content: Thanks Helen. That was my thought as well. Maybe they can fill it up weekly until later. Hopefully I’ll know more Tuesday. Anyway it’s NYE tomorrow and I’m not in pain so I’ll be out. Happy New Year to you xx
Posts.Title: Expander implant leaked

Posts.Content: Thanks Jilly. Did they refill it or leave it as it was? I’m guessing I’m half the size I was, about 200ml gone.
Posts.Title: Expander implant leaked

Posts.Content: Hi No I didn’t get any information.
Posts.Title: Expander implant leaked

Posts.Content: UPDATE: I will need another operation to remove the faulty expander after chemo with a different one where the valve is fitted between the ribs so I can have radiotherapy. The surgeon increased it by another 100mls but it was gone again in 48 hours.  You don’t expect expander’s to leak, especially when you’re already going through so much.
Posts.Title: Expander implant leaked
